attributes.action: give greater protection to shop workers who ARE being forced to work Sundays despite this being agiainst the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Having worked in retail I have been forced to work sundays.  Having attempted to opt out and discussed this with my manager I was told it was not an option only to find since leaving that I have a statutory right to opt out of Sunday Working. With shops hoping to open later surely shop workers should be given better protection and be able to take action without it affecting job security.
